thread.title: A suspect in the killing of a Boston nurse eluded authorities for months. Then police spotted him at a Kenyan nightclub
thread.title_full: A suspect in the killing of a Boston nurse eluded authorities for months. Then police spotted him at a Kenyan nightclub

author: Shoutem, Inc.
title: A suspect in the killing of a Boston nurse eluded authorities for months. Then police spotted him at a Kenyan nightclub
text:
Nairobi, Kenya (CNN) — It had been three months since Maggie Mbitu was found dead at Boston’s airport, and authorities seemed no closer to finding the man suspected of killing her and fleeing the country.
But this week, they finally got a break. On Monday night an undercover officer spotted someone who looked like the suspect at a nightclub 7,000 miles away in Nairobi, Kenya, and struck up a conversation with him, a police official told CNN.
